titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding reduction of the public debt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary: 2/4/1999--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that any comprehensive legislation that balances the budget by a certain date and is agreed to by the Congress and the President should contain a strategy for reducing the U.S. public debt.
